resources.string: Please stop recording before if you want to quit.

Capturing Audio

Simple audio recorder on Sd Card (in folder Capturing Audio)

Laurent Bernab√© (2016).

Credits

 Launcher icon and recording icon were made with picture from icones.pro, designed by New Mooon (http://icones.pro/gtk-medias-enregistrer-2-image-png.html)
 Stop recording icon were made with picture from icones.pro, designed by David Vignoni (http://icones.pro/en/drive-stop-5-png-image.html)
 Help icon was generated with Android icon generator (https://romannurik.github.io/AndroidAssetStudio/icons-actionbar.htm) and ic_action_action_help icon.
